Title: Erratum to: In vivo molecular profiling of human glioma using diffusion kurtosis imaging (Journal of Neuro-Oncology, (2017), 131, 1, (93-101), 10.1007/s11060-016-2272-0)
Abstract: © 2016, Springer Science+Business Media New York.In the initial online publication, the second author’s family name was incorrect. The name has been updated in the online article and is correct in this erratum too.
